org.opends.server.backends.task

Class RecurringTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opends.server.backends.task.RecurringTask

  • public class RecurringTask
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines a information about a recurring task, which will be used to repeatedly schedule tasks for processing.
    It also provides some static methods that allow to validate strings in crontab (5) format.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RecurringTask(TaskScheduler taskScheduler, Entry recurringTaskEntry)
      Creates a new recurring task based on the information in the provided entry.

      Retrieves the unique ID assigned to this recurring task.

      Retrieves the fully-qualified name of the Java class that provides the implementation logic for this recurring task.

      Parse and validate recurring task schedule field.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RecurringTask

        public RecurringTask(TaskScheduler taskScheduler,
             Entry recurringTaskEntry)
              throws DirectoryException
        Creates a new recurring task based on the information in the provided entry.
        Parameters:
        taskScheduler - A reference to the task scheduler that may be used to schedule new tasks.
        recurringTaskEntry - The entry containing the information to use to define the task to process.
        Throws:
        DirectoryException - If the provided entry does not contain a valid recurring task definition.

      • scheduleNextIteration

        public Task scheduleNextIteration(java.util.GregorianCalendar calendar)
                           throws DirectoryException
        Schedules the next iteration of this recurring task for processing.
        Parameters:
        calendar - date and time to schedule next iteration from.
        Returns:
        The task that has been scheduled for processing.
        Throws:
        DirectoryException - to indicate an error.

      • parseTaskTab

        public static void parseTaskTab(java.lang.String taskSchedule)
                         throws DirectoryException
        Parse and validate recurring task schedule.
        Parameters:
        taskSchedule - recurring task schedule tab in crontab(5) format.
        Throws:
        DirectoryException - to indicate an error.

      • parseTaskTabField

        public static boolean[] parseTaskTabField(java.lang.String tabField,
                          int minValue,
                          int maxValue)
                                   throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Parse and validate recurring task schedule field.
        Parameters:
        tabField - recurring task schedule field in crontab(5) format.
        minValue - minimum value allowed for this field.
        maxValue - maximum value allowed for this field.
        Returns:
        boolean schedule slots range set according to the schedule field.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if tab field is invalid.
